location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 5: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter concerns the movement of the Lapwing.William Digges Latouche informs Edward Galley that, if the Lapwingis still at Bushire, he should immediately dispatch her to Bombay. Galley is also informed of the need to secure another pilot to take the Lapwingover the bar.
